text:
hi everyone, i'm wondering how I could develop a module who use the catalog in HubSpot ? Or there is a possibilty to add custom css on existing module ?
If I develop a template I loose the functionalities to pick up the product from my product database and need to import images, descriptions, price manually. Which is not viable.
I would need to make the Products module pimped up to be sexy and within brand guideline but my option are very limited without at least a CSS access on the email.
